metadata.feature_description: Filter activity stream by various criteria and activity types

steps.expected: Activity Feed page displays with filter dropdown
steps.actual: Activity Feed page loaded with 'Filter by activity' dropdown visible

steps.expected: Stream filters to show only photo-related posts
steps.actual: Dropdown selection changed to Photos and stream filtered to photo content

steps.action: Select 'Added to Wiki' from filter dropdown
steps.expected: Stream filters to show only wiki-related posts
steps.actual: Dropdown selection changed to 'Added to Wiki' and stream displayed wiki content

steps.action: Click on 'Photos and Wiki Filter' in the saved filters list
steps.expected: Saved filter is applied and stream shows matching content
steps.actual: Clicked on saved filter, stream filtered according to saved criteria

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create new filter with activity types

steps.actual: Custom Feed Builder dialog opened with filter name, authors, groups, and activity type fields

steps.action: Enter filter name 'Test Posts and Files Filter'

steps.actual: Posts and Files types selected via checkbox clicks

steps.expected: Filter saved and appears in saved filters list
steps.actual: Dialog closed and 'Test Posts and Files Filter' appeared in saved filters list

steps.action: Select 'Filter by activity' (default option) to clear filter
steps.expected: All filters cleared and all posts displayed
steps.actual: Filter reset to default, all activity types now displayed in stream

steps.action: Hover over saved filter to reveal edit option
steps.expected: Edit icon or option becomes visible
steps.actual: Edit pencil icon appeared next to filter name on hover

steps.action: Click edit icon to open Custom Feed Builder
steps.expected: Dialog opens with existing filter settings loaded
steps.actual: Custom Feed Builder opened with 'Test Posts and Files Filter' settings pre-populated
Photos type added to existing filter selection
Dialog closed and filter updated with new activity types

steps.action: Open edit dialog for 'Test Posts and Files Filter'
steps.expected: Custom Feed Builder dialog opens with Delete button visible
steps.actual: Dialog opened with Delete button available

steps.expected: Filter deleted and removed from saved filters list
steps.actual: Filter successfully deleted, 'Test Posts and Files Filter' no longer appears in saved filters list

observations: Code review confirms no date range filter exists in the UI - the filter system only supports filtering by activity type, author, and group
Filter by user/author is only available within saved Custom Feeds (not in the main dropdown), accessed via the Activity Authors field in the Custom Feed Builder dialog
Filter by group is only available within saved Custom Feeds (not in the main dropdown), accessed via the Activity Groups field in the Custom Feed Builder dialog
Multiple filters can be combined by creating a saved Custom Feed with multiple criteria (authors, groups, and activity types)
Filter persistence across sessions is handled via saved Custom Feeds - these persist in the sidebar and can be reapplied at any time
The dropdown filter (activity type) does not persist across sessions - it resets to 'Filter by activity' on page reload
